msbt.message: The Halloween festivities are tonight! Everyone has worked so hard to make it a fun time, .I've got a few more tasks to cross off my list before then. That way, I can really enjoy myself!
Today is finally Halloween. I'm so excited about tonight's big event, .Oh, I wish I had time to whip up a new dessert, like with pumpkin sprinkles!
Are you going to the Halloween festivities tonight?I think you can guess that I'm looking forward to getting candy from you, . I really hope that our paths cross tonight, !
It's ! Which means that it's almost time for the Halloween fun to begin, !Oh, I can't wait! I can't wait! Wow, I had better relax. Maybe some will help.
The Halloween festivities are starting soon, . Which will it be, funnier or scarier?I can't wait to find out. But one thing: Don't surprise me too much later. Or maybe do!

Once the clock strikes fiveit all begins! Halloween, at last! Be sure to have enough candy, alright?I wonder how everyone is dressing up? I guess we'll find out soon. I'd better change into my costumeI hope you like what I've picked out for tonight, !
Have you been seeing the pumpkin decorations? The Halloween spirit is in the air!Much as I like Halloween, it's pumpkins that I love this time of year, !
The more pumpkin decorations I see, the more excited I get. I can't wait for Halloween, .
The island has filled up with pumpkin decorations. Isn't it wonderful?What will happen if even more appear? It's almost too exciting to think about, .

Have you seen all of the pumpkin decorations, ?Pumpkins to the left, and pumpkins to the right, and pumpkins all over, .The stage is set for Halloween! It's like the big show is soon to start here on !
